import React ,{useState} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Button,Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreens = () => { const cart=useSelector(state=> state.cart) const addDecimals=(num) =>{ return (Math.round(num*100)/100).toFixed(2) } //Calculating Prices cart.itemsPrice= cart.cartItems.reduce((acc,item)=> acc+(item.price *item.qty),0) cart.shippingPrice= cart.itemsPrice>1000 ? 0: 100 cart.taxPrice= addDecimals(Number((0.15 * cart.itemsPrice).toFixed(2))) const placeOrderHandler= () =>{ console.log('order') } return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address},{cart.shippingAddress.city},{' '}{cart.shippingAddress.pincode},{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length===0? Your Cart is Empty.:( {cart.cartItems.map((item,index)=> ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ₹{item.price} = ₹{item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ₹ {cart.itemsPrice} Shipping ₹ {cart.shippingPrice} Tax ₹ {cart.taxPrice} Total ₹ {cart.totalPrice} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreens
